alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Cass; Grand Forks; Richland; Steele; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued April 23 at 5:22PM CDT until April 23 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 147 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN MINNESOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 12 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MINNESOTA WADENA IN NORTH CENTRAL MINNESOTA HUBBARD IN NORTHWEST MINNESOTA BECKER CLEARWATER MAHNOMEN NORMAN POLK RED LAKE IN WEST CENTRAL MINNESOTA CLAY GRANT OTTER TAIL WILKIN IN NORTH DAKOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST NORTH DAKOTA GRAND FORKS IN SOUTHEAST NORTH DAKOTA BARNES CASS RICHLAND STEELE TRAILL THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ADA, ASHBY, BAGLEY, BARRETT, BRECKENRIDGE, CLEARBROOK, CROOKSTON, DETROIT LAKES, EAST GRAND FORKS, ELBOW LAKE, FARGO, FERGUS FALLS, FINLEY, GRAND FORKS, HALSTAD, HATTON, HERMAN, HILLSBORO, HOFFMAN, HOPE, MAHNOMEN, MAYVILLE, MENAHGA, MOORHEAD, NAYTAHWAUSH, PARK RAPIDS, PORTLAND, RED LAKE FALLS, TWIN VALLEY, VALLEY CITY, WADENA, WAHPETON, AND WAUBUN.

area.areaDesc: Barnes; Cass; Grand Forks; Richland; Steele; Traill
